title: Kenichi Endo to Kankuro Kudo no Benkyo Sasete Itadakimasu
overview: Kenichi Endo (Kenichi Endo) plays Detective Moroi in a suspense drama series. Problems arise on the set of the drama series. This causes the leads to film their scenes again, but the other actors and actresses have already left the set. Actors and actresses who happen to be nearby are offered parts in the drama series.
